metadata.title: A SENSITIVE RADIOIMMUNOASSAY FOR THE DETERMINATION OF ANTIBODIES TO MOUSE HEPATITIS VIRUS

abstract.original_text: A solid-phase radioimmunoassay is described for the detection of antibodies to mouse hepatitis virus.

sentences.segment_text: A solid-phase radioimmunoassay is described for the detection of antibodies to mouse hepatitis virus .

abstract.original_text: Viruses were purified by velocity and isopycnic gradient centrifugation and 96-well plastic plates were coated with viral antigens. To allow the detection of most serotypes of low titered antisera, a pool of antigens from several viral serotypes were employed.
